entry.title: BIP sighash_noinput
entry.summary: ZmnSCPxj, a contributor to the Bitcoin network, has suggested changing the name of a flag in the codebase. The current name, SIGHASH_REUSE_VULNERABLE, is deemed insufficiently informative about what the flag actually does. ZmnSCPxj suggests two alternative names: SIGHASH_NOINPUT_REUSE_VULNERABLE and SIGHASH_NOINPUT_VULNERABLE. It is unclear whether this suggestion will be implemented in the future.
